body:
Hello,



the fact is that I used the same surface to do the analysis. the surface direction is the same as the vectors.. 

there should be another reason i guess..



(I evaluate the surface direction and the normal is (1.0,0.0,0.0) and the verctor direction (output of gen test point definition are all  (1.0,0.0,0.0) )
